## MetaManager context get

Get the current context name

### Synopsis

Prints the current context (from MM_CONTEXT or the context file). Prints nothing if no context is set.

```
MetaManager context get [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for get
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
  -d, --debug   enable debug logging
```
